title: Like A Virgin
lyrics: I made it through the wilderness Didn't know how lost I was I was beat Incomplete But you made me feel Yeah, you made me feel shiny and new Hoo, Like a virgin touched for the very first time Like a virgin when your heart beats Gonna give you all my love, boy Been saving it all for you 'Cause only love can last You're so fine and you're mine Oh your love thawed out Yeah, your love thawed out what was scared and cold Hoo, Like a virgin touched for the very first time Like a virgin when your heart beats Next to mine Whoa Whoa, ah Whoa You're so fine and you're mine But you made me feel Yeah, you made me feel I've nothing to hide Hoo, Like a virgin touched for the very first time Like a virgin when your heart beats Next to mine Like a virgin, ooh ooh like a virgin Feels so good in side When you hold me, and your heart beats,
